channel.title: Rosa Hybridaaa on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Rosa Hybridaaa on funPlantGenes

item.title: RcMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RcMYB1 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: The MYB transcription factor RcMYB1 plays a central role in rose anthocyanin biosynthesis.

item.title: RhARF7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhARF7 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: We established that the auxin signaling protein RhARF7 binds to the promoter of RhSUC2, and that silencing of RhARF7 reduces petal Suc contents and promotes petal abscission.

item.title: RhbZIP17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: RchiOBHm_Chr3g0480361 Gene Symbol: RhbZIP17 Gene Name: Genome: RchiOBHm-V2(https://lipm-browsers.

item.title: RhCCCH12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhCCCH12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Two transcription factors, RhERF005 and RhCCCH12, regulate rose resistance to Botrytis cinerea by modulating cytokinin levels.

item.title: RhERF005
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhERF005 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Two transcription factors, RhERF005 and RhCCCH12, regulate rose resistance to Botrytis cinerea by modulating cytokinin levels.

item.title: RhGID1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhGID1B Gene Name: GIBBERELLIN INSENSITIVE DWARF1 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: The F-box protein RhSAF destabilizes the gibberellic acid receptor RhGID1 to mediate ethylene-induced petal senescence in rose.

item.title: RhGID1C
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhGID1C Gene Name: GIBBERELLIN INSENSITIVE DWARF1 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: The F-box protein RhSAF destabilizes the gibberellic acid receptor RhGID1 to mediate ethylene-induced petal senescence in rose.

item.title: RhHB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhHB1 Gene Name: homeobox-leucine zipper protein 1 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Silencing RhHB1 decreased petal dehydration tolerance and resulted in a persistent increase in JA-Ile content and reduced dehydration tolerance.

item.title: RhPAASa1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhPAASa1 Gene Name: PHENYLACETALDEHYDE SYNTHASE Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Biosynthesis of 2-Phenylethanol in Rose Petals Is Linked to the Expression of One Allele of RhPAAS.

item.title: RhPAASa2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhPAASa2 Gene Name: PHENYLACETALDEHYDE SYNTHASE Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Biosynthesis of 2-Phenylethanol in Rose Petals Is Linked to the Expression of One Allele of RhPAAS.

item.title: RhPAASa3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhPAASa3 Gene Name: PHENYLACETALDEHYDE SYNTHASE Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Biosynthesis of 2-Phenylethanol in Rose Petals Is Linked to the Expression of One Allele of RhPAAS.

item.title: RhPLATZ9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhPLATZ9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: The RhWRKY33a-RhPLATZ9 regulatory module delays petal senescence by suppressing rapid reactive oxygen species accumulation in rose flowers.

item.title: RhSAF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhSAF Gene Name: SENESCENCE-ASSOCIATED F-BOX Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: The F-box protein RhSAF destabilizes the gibberellic acid receptor RhGID1 to mediate ethylene-induced petal senescence in rose.

item.title: RhSUC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhSUC2 Gene Name: sucrose proton symporter 2 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: Regulation of RhSUC2, a sucrose transporter, is correlated with the light control of bud burst in Rosa sp.

item.title: RhVI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhVI1 Gene Name: Rosa hybridaaa Vacuolar Invertase isoform 1 Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: RhVI1 is a membrane-anchored vacuolar invertase highly expressed in Rosa hybridaaa L.

item.title: RhWRKY30
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: RchiOBHm_Chr4g0429851 Gene Symbol: RhWRKY30 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 30 Genome: RchiOBHm-V2(https://lipm-browsers.

item.title: RhWRKY33a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RhWRKY33a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa hybridaaa Functional Descriptions: The RhWRKY33a-RhPLATZ9 regulatory module delays petal senescence by suppressing rapid reactive oxygen species accumulation in rose flowers.
